name: fortinet-fortirecon-brand-protection
label: Fortinet FortiRecon Brand Protection
description: FortiRecon is a Digital Risk Protection Service (DRPS) product that provides an outside-the-network view to the risks posed to your enterprise.

fields.name: server_url
fields.title: Server URL
fields.description: Server name or IP address to which you will connect and perform the automated operations

fields.name: api_key
fields.title: API Key
fields.description: API key to access the endpoint to which you will connect and perform the automated operations

fields.name: org_id
fields.title: Organization ID
fields.description: The organization ID on which FortiRecon operations are to be performed.

fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.description:
Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.
By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Get Rogue Apps
operations.description: Retrieves a list of Rogue Apps based on the status and keywords that you have specified for the query; rogue apps are mobile applications trying to look like apps from trusted brands.

parameters.name: status
parameters.title: Status
parameters.description: (Optional) Select the rogue app's status type from the following options to filter the results: Unofficial:Apps published by users that are not recognized officially, RogueApps: Apps published by known malicious actors or deemed to be potentially malicious.
parameters.tooltip: Select the rogue app's status type from the following options to filter the results.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.title: Keyword
parameters.tooltip: Specify the keywords to filter the results. For example: Source Name, Developer Name, App Name.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the keywords to filter the results. For example: Source Name, Developer Name, App Name.

parameters.name: page
parameters.title: Page
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records. Default page is 1.

parameters.name: size
parameters.title: Size
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the count of records that the operation should include for the current page. Defaults to 10 and max up to 500 records per page.

operations.title: Get Rogue App By ID
operations.description: Retrieves details of a rogue app based on the Rogue App ID that you have specified.

parameters.name: id
parameters.title: Rogue App ID
parameters.tooltip: Specify an ID of the rogue app to get its details.
parameters.description: Specify an ID of the rogue app to get its details.

operations.title: Get Takedown Requests
operations.description: Retrieves a list of takedown requests for rogue apps and typo domains for the given organization.

parameters.name: status
parameters.title: Status
parameters.tooltip: Select the take-down request status from the following options to filter the results.
parameters.description: (Optional) Select the take-down request status from the following options to filter the results: Requested, Acknowledged, Initiated, Closed.

parameters.name: category
parameters.title: Category
parameters.tooltip: Select the take-down request category from the following options to filter the results.
parameters.description: (Optional) Select the take-down request category from the following options to filter the results:  Phishing, Fraudulentdomains, Typosquatting, RogueApps, Alert.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.title: Keyword
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the keywords to filter the results. For example: ticketId, entity (It may be a domain name, the title of a report, Phished Domain, etc)
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the keywords to filter the results. For example: ticketId, entity (It may be a domain name, the title of a report, Phished Domain, etc)

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.title: Start Date
parameters.tooltip: Specify the start date of the range when the takedown was requested; default is last 6 months.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the start date of the range when the takedown was requested; default is last 6 months.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.title: End Date
parameters.tooltip: Specify the end date of the range when the takedown was requested; default is today's date.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the end date of the range when the takedown was requested; default is today's date.

parameters.name: page
parameters.title: Page
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records. Defaults to 1.

parameters.name: size
parameters.title: Size
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the count of records that the operation should include for the current page. Defaults to 10 and max up to 500 records per page.
